# antd cascader 搜索后回显异常

### Reproduction link

[https://stackblitz.com/edit/react-sfgbj6?file=demo.tsx](https://stackblitz.com/edit/react-sfgbj6?file=demo.tsx)

### Steps to reproduce

1. 搜索"营销"，键盘向下选择，显示value 2.通过一层层点选显示正常

### What is expected?

| System      | macos13               |
| Browser     | Chrome 113.0.5672.126 |
